items.title: Coach John Beam dies after being shot on college campus
items.description: Legendary former football coach John Beam died on Friday morning after he was shot on the Laney College campus in Oakland, California, on Thursday.

items.title: Preliminary findings show fatigue crack caused Keystone Pipeline oil spill
items.description: The operator of the Keystone Pipeline says preliminary findings indicate a fatigue crack caused an oil spill in North Dakota in April

items.title: WATCH:  Manhunt for escaped inmate with 'violent tendencies' underway in Louisiana
items.description: Police are searching for a man who escaped from a Louisiana jail by allegedly throwing cleaning supplies in an officer's face.

items.title: Trump calls for DOJ probe into other Epstein ties, including Clinton
items.description: Trump is directing the DOJ to investigate Jeffrey Epstein's connections to high-profile Democrats.

items.title: WATCH:  Fish swim among diners in flooded Thai restaurant
items.description: A flooded riverside restaurant in Thailand has become an online sensation.
